config_info.note: Replace all YOUR_* placeholders with actual FYERS API credentials
instructions: 1. Get client_id and secret_key from FYERS app registration
2. Generate access_token using FYERS authentication flow
3. Copy this file to 'fyers_config.json' with real values
4. Never commit the real config file to version control
config_info.demo_mode: System will use demo data if this config is not properly set up
